original_text: And he brought near the clans of Judah, and the clan of the Zerahites was taken. And he brought near the clan of the Zerahites man by man, and Zabdi was taken.
korean_text: 유다 족속을 가까이 나아오게 하였더니 세라 족속이 뽑혔고 세라 족속의 각 남자를 가까이 나아오게 하였더니 삽디가 뽑혔고

sentences.original_text: And he brought near the clans of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 유다 지파들을 가까이 오게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the clan of the Zerahites was taken
And he brought near the clan of the Zerahites man by man
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 세라 지파를 사람 한 명씩 가까이 오게 했습니다.
